thread.title: SABMiller raises annual cost savings target to at least $1.05 billion
thread.title_full: SABMiller raises annual cost savings target to at least $1.05 billion | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: SABMiller raises annual cost savings target to at least $1.05 billion
text:
SABMiller Plc ( SAB.L ) said it had raised its target for annual run rate cost savings to at least $1.05 billion by March 31, 2020.
The company said additional savings would come from its integrated supply chain, with about 70 percent from procurement and the rest from manufacturing and distribution.
SABMiller said it expected to incur incremental non-recurring costs of $26 million by 2020.
(Reporting by Noor Zainab Hussain in Bengaluru; Editing by Anupama Dwivedi)
